reason: Node 1.2 uses two facts established in node 1.1 but declares no dependencies: (1) B is the specific block containing a_1 (from 1.1's definition of B), and (2) n >= 1 (from 1.1's WLOG assumption), which is a required hypothesis for Lemma 11.3.
